name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free VPN for Chrome - VPN Proxy InsuredVPN

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast, Free, Easy-To-Use, and Secure VPN with the ability to stream Movie or TV Series in other countries!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't forget to leave a 5-Star review!! That really helps us out! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

InsuredVPN: Allows you to stream Movies & TV series in other countries on your favorite streaming services. Also secures/encrypts your wifi network from people trying to steal your information.

✅ Easy To Use:

1. Click on our extension (Globe) 🌎 logo in your extension bar
2. Choose the location you want
3. Click the button to turn on the VPN
4. Thats it! Easy as 1, 2, 3….literally

All of your network is encrypted while using the InsuredVPN extension. Guards you against frauds and hackers. Also secures your personal data and hides your location. Its your entitled freedom to choose to search whatever you’d like on the internet without anyone knowing.

✅ Features:

- Stream different streaming services in different countries
- Unblock blocked websites while in different countries
- High-speed server network
- Blocks Trackers, & Malware
- Strict No-Logs policy
- 24/7 Customer Service
- Available only as a Chrome Extension at the moment


✅ Current streaming platforms that InsuredVPN works on:

- Netflix
- Amazon Prime Video
- HBO MAX

*Working on adding other streaming platforms!

✅ More Info about what makes InsuredVPN the best:

🎥 Streaming Movies & TV Series from Different Countries
    - Unlocks to watch any of your favorite movies or shows that are not allowed in your current location

🔓 Full Access to Blocked Websites & Applications
    - A lot of countries limit the ability to go on certain restricted websites in foreign countries so we allow people to access those with ease.
    - Or if you are in school and you are blocked from going onto certain sites, you would use InsuredVPN extension to unblock those sites.
    - Watch your favorite video content, listen to your favorite music in HD, or play online games with the help of our VPN.

🔒 Anonymity & Privacy Protection
    - While using InsuredVPN, your connection will be hidden from all your web activities.
    - Secure your browser & protect yourself from hackers or unknowns tracking your activities
    - Install & apply our VPN instead of using Incognito browsers which don’t actually hide your searches to the owner of the network & internet company.

✨ Simple Setup
    - Change the location if you don’t want the default one, other than that, click the big red button 🔴 and make it turn green 🟢 for it to be active
    - Connect to InsuredVPN with a click of a button. The connection is automatic with no need for you do anything besides select your location and click the red button 🔴 —> 🟢.

🕵️‍♂️ Secure Web Access in Public Internet
    - Protect your browser from any danger while on public wifi hotspots. Secures all of your sensitive data through bank encrypted security.

Log:

🌟 It is free to download and use! 🌟
